attributes.action: Declare war on Mugabe and his army.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This has to stop, and it will need power (NOT mediation) to stop this man and his organisation.
The UK needs to fight for Zimbabwe and the Zimbabwean people. 
Lets make a difference to so many peoples lives and show that the world does not condone this abuse of human rights. To merely stand aside and let this continue goes against the British policies and belief's.
The UK should reach forward and show the Zimbabwean people that we are friends.... WE CAN MAKE A DIFFERENCE!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
